did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Johnson Graduate School of Management Library records, 1947-2002.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Johnson Graduate School of Management (Cornell University).Library.

did.physdesc: Correspondence, reports, minutes of meetings, photographs, and files.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Includes correspondence, reports, minutes of meetings, photographs, and files on the activities and administration of the library.

bioghist.head: ORGANIZATIONAL HISTORY
bioghist.p: In 1985, the Graduate School of Business and Public Administration changed its name to the Johnson Graduate School of Management.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Includes correspondence, reports, minutes of meetings, photographs, and files on the activities and administration of the library.
